description: Explore the dual nature of blockchain technology, focusing on its significant energy consumption and environmental implications. This article examines the sustainability challenges associated with blockchain, particularly with the Proof of Work model, and highlights potential solutions and shifts towards a more sustainable future, such as Proof of Stake and renewable energy initiatives.
keywords: Blockchain energy consumption, Proof of Work, sustainability, renewable energy, Proof of Stake, Ethereum 2.0, cryptocurrency environmental impact, digital currencies, blockchain applications, environmental sustainability
title: Blockchain Energy Consumption: Navigating the Double-Edged Sword
